title: Julia Louis-Dreyfus dazzles in sleeveless metallic dress
text:
She was the recipient of this year's Icon Of The Year.

And Julia Louis-Dreyfus showcased her winning fashion credentials as she made her way to the InStyle Awards in Los Angeles on Monday.

The actress, 58, shone bright in a curve-hugging metallic dress with pointed high heels.

Dare to dazzle! Julia Louis Dreyfus was definitely looking like a fashion icon as she made her way to the InStyle Awards in Los Angeles on Monday

Julia's glittering dress cinched into her svelte torso while also showcasing her fabulous arms.

The showstopping shade ensured all eyes would be on the actress as she headed down the red carpet.

Julia even touched up her complexion with hints of silver.

She brought out her brown eyes with a coat of icy shadow, though added a golden touch with peach blush and some lip gloss.

Strike a pose! The Veep star worked her magic on the red carpet

Stunning: She still looked radiant with a peachy hue of blush and an application of lip gloss

Icy jewelry were also nice touches to the wintry look.

The Seinfeld star styled her jet black hair into a rather voluminous style of loose, full curls that added a retro feel to her ensemble.

Joining Julia on the red carpet was her dashing Veep co-star, Tony Hale, who would be presenting her with the Icon Of The Year award.

Family affair! Julia has been married to Brad Hall since 1987, and together they have sons Charlie, 22, and Henry, 27

The actor wore a pale grey suit that complimented Julia's silver look.

Julia's Icon Of The Year award is definitely well-deserved.

After shooting to stardom playing Elaine Benes on Seinfeld, Julia has gone on to portray a slew of memorable roles, including Christine Campbell on The New Adventures Of Old Christine, and more recently Selina Meyer on Veep.

Proud: Joining Julia on the red carpet was her dashing Veep co-star, Tony Hale, who would be presenting her with the Icon Of The Year award

She's received multiple Emmy awards over the years for her work on Seinfeld and Veep, which recently aired it's seventh and final season.

Julia has been married to Brad Hall since 1987, and together they have sons Charlie, 22, and Henry, 27.

She announced last year she had was cancer-free, after revealing her breast cancer diagnosis in 2017.
